text.__SUMMARY__: Odostomia ignorata is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The shell size varies between 3 mm and 6 mm.
text.Distribution:
This species occurs in the following locations:
European waters (ERMS scope) : Mediterranean Sea off Italy.
text.External links:
"Odostomia (Auristomia) bulimulus ignorata". Gastropods.com. Retrieved 13 November 2011.
